lead_paragraph: Serena Williams says Maria Sharapova "showed a lot of courage" in taking responsibility for her failed drug test.

headline.print_headline: Serena Lauds Sharapova for Owning Up to Failed Drug Test
headline.main: Serena Lauds Sharapova for Owning Up to Failed Drug Test

snippet: Serena Williams says Maria Sharapova "showed a lot of courage" in taking responsibility for her failed drug test....
